org.apache.lucene.queryParser.standard.config

Class NumericConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.lucene.queryParser.standard.config.NumericConfig 

  •        public class
       
        NumericConfig
       
       extends
       
        Object
    This class holds the configuration used to parse numeric queries and create NumericRangeQuery s.
    See Also:
    NumericRangeQuery , NumberFormat
